config.title: Interview Assessment Workflow
config.description: Multi-agent LangGraph workflow for comprehensive interview assessment with scoring and report generation

agents_overview.name: DataPreprocessingAgent
agents_overview.purpose: Parse and structure transcript, resume, and job data

agents_overview.name: TechnicalSkillsAgent
agents_overview.purpose: Evaluate technical competencies and skill alignment
agents_overview.output: Technical score (0-100) with evidence and gaps

agents_overview.name: BehavioralAssessmentAgent
agents_overview.purpose: Assess communication, leadership, and soft skills

agents_overview.name: ExperienceRelevanceAgent
agents_overview.purpose: Evaluate experience alignment and career progression

agents_overview.name: CulturalFitAgent
agents_overview.output: Cultural fit score (0-100) with integration potential

agents_overview.name: ScoringDecisionAgent
agents_overview.purpose: Calculate weighted final score and hiring decision

agents_overview.name: ReportGenerationAgent
agents_overview.output: Detailed report with scores, evidence, and recommendations

agents_overview.name: QualityAssuranceAgent
agents_overview.output: Quality check and regeneration flag if needed
